name: Positive.coe_inv
initialProofState:
K : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedField K
x : Subtype fun x => LT.lt 0 x
⊢ Eq (↑(Inv.inv x)) (Inv.inv ↑x)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_inv (x : { x : K // 0 < x }) : ↑x⁻¹ = (x⁻¹ : K) :=
  rfl

name: Positive.coe_zpow
initialProofState:
K : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedField K
x : Subtype fun x => LT.lt 0 x
n : Int
⊢ Eq (↑(HPow.hPow x n)) (HPow.hPow (↑x) n)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_zpow (x : { x : K // 0 < x }) (n : ℤ) : ↑(x ^ n) = (x : K) ^ n :=
  rfl
